name: Memory (itch) (Colton Johnson)
description:
This game is a record of one of my favorite memories as a kid, in a forest near my home. I felt like a game was the best way to share that memory. It's just meant to be played once, and then you are done.

Controls:

Space - Jump

Arrow Keys or WASD - Move

All of the assets were made by talented artists who graciously put them online for free. This project is my first game I've made on my own, and is more of a learning experience. I am grateful to these artists for letting me use their talent to make something much better looking than I ever could have, and I've listed them below:

Edermunizz

Sanctumpixel

Sven Thole

Untied Games

If I've missed anyone, I am very sorry, but I think I've got them all. 

Thank you for playing!
